name: *NEW* PAHC: Pennsylvania Hardcore compilation -30 bands!!
description: Just released, the PAHC compilation is homage to today's best PAHC bands going, including bands like Wisdom in Chains, Strength For a Reason, CDC Barricade and many more.  30 bands in all are on this release, topping the music off at 1 HOUR AND 20 MINUTES of what this fine state has to offer!  Don't let this one slip past your collection.  There is something for everyone on this release.

name: *NEW*FACE YOUR ENEMY "Steal the Crown"
description:
One of the toughest CDs you will own.  If you are into heavy, HEAVY, HEAVY Hardcore with tough breaks, 2-steps and gang vocals, pick this up, you wont be disappointed.  One of Europe's newest and hardest bands to come out in recent years.  Pick up their disc here!

this CD features 10 tracks produced by Daniel Giordana ( HATEBREED/MADBALL) and will leave you wanting to smash windows and beat up emo kids and steal their girlfriends.

For fans of Terror, and any form of tough guy hardcore

name: *NEW*Embrace Destruction "Kingdom of Torture"
description:
Hailing From Italy, ED has put forth a heavy hitting release lined with the message of Freedom in Kingdom of Torture.  The Cd is produced by Daniel Giordana ( HATEBREED/MADBALL).  the Cd features 11 tracks of in your face European hardcore not for the weak of heart with influences of Merauder, old Full Blown Chaos, Born From pain and Hatebreed

Be sure to grab their debut release now before kids catch on to this album and then you're"Jumping on the bandwagon"

name: Older Releases and DISTRO(DTD, Stay COLD, RISE FROM ABOVE more...)
description:
**Please read directions on how to order at the bottom**
Each sale is for 1 cd, not 1 of all listed!!!!!!!!!

Titles Available:
- Stay Cold/Rise From Above "Rising From the Cold" split cd
- Cheyenne "Doom Prophets"
- Loyal To the Grave "Still Climbing Still Believin(S. Korea Version)
- Unleashed Anger - "StraightForward"
- FACEOFF - "No Hope For This World"
- DTD "Never Looking Back"
- Legends Stand Tall Compilation(26 Bands)

If you wish to order one of these cd's click add to cart, and before you checkout, please write a comment in the order box addressing which cd you wish to purchase.  If there is no message I will send you an email, but you could save us both the time by writing which cd you want(same if you want more than 1 cd)

name: *NEW*ToEdGein - s/t(pic coming soon)
description: Honestly one of my favorite cds.  This CD has everything from catchy sing alongs to great breaks and dance parts.  If you cant find something to enjoy on this disc, then you must not like hardcore or punk music...that simple...pick this up!
